forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the tranquil heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night wears a cloak of stillness, trading the warmth of day for a cool embrace, as the temperature slips to a gentle 55 degrees. A soft, persistent wind from the north-northwest whispers through the streets, while the low-hanging clouds seep into the crevices of the hills, casting a diffuse veil over the city. As night deepens, fog may curl languidly around the contours of the Golden Gate, hinting at the marine layer's presence without fully obscuring the twinkling lights of the metropolis.

As dawn approaches and the day breaks, expect a transition to partly sunny skies, where hints of blue cheerfully penetrate the clouds, heralding a high that will flirt with 70 degrees. This gentle warmth will soften into the afternoon, creating a comforting atmosphere ideal for a leisurely stroll. A light sweater or a casual jacket will suffice, making it easy to enjoy the soft caresses of the afternoon breeze. Venture to the waterfront to appreciate the glimmering bay, or lose yourself in the inviting scents of an outdoor café. Perhaps a favorite book awaits, tucked beneath an arm, beckoning you to settle into a cozy spot among the vibrant bustle of the city, where the peculiar charm of San Francisco comes alive anew.
